trends: There has been one other sighting in Wangaratta
There were no other sightings in Wangaratta on or around August 14th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going for an early morning drive when something made me feel like I shouldpull over so I did. The car cut out the radio went dead and that song from theeighties came over the radio.... Fade to Gray then a huge light lit up in themiddle of a paddock just near the Warby Ranges near Wangaratta. I could seesmall human like creatures walking around under the light. I felt a voice in mesay you can come with us now to a more beautiful place and I said Icant I have alittle girl to think of and they said maybe another time.... NAd theydisappeared the car started and the radio went back to the original station.
Summary: Light in muddle of paddock radio and car went dead
